# Paragraphs

For line break test this double space for emphasis, *test* **this**
***Wow*** ~~Wonderful~~ For horizontal line

------------------------------------------------------------------------

For lists : \* Test \* this

For numbered list : 1. Test 3. this 2. Out

For nested lists : \* Test *This* Out *Wow* Wondeful

To quote text, \> Test this out

For Link, [Test This
Out](https://moodle.uclouvain.be/course/view.php?id=4003) Or without []

For images test this ![](Transcript%20records%20Master.JPG)

For code

´´´r print("Test This") ´´´

Or for inline code ´r print("Test This")´

For tables use

| Test | This | Out |
|:-----|:----:|----:|
| a    |  b   |   c |

For math equation $\beta = 2$ or $$\beta = 2$$ To make comments use
<!-- Wow this is a comment check this out --> Finally for empty space
use     this wow
